title: The Business file.
creator_credit: Paul Bosner and Dallas County Community College
brief_description: Hosted by Alex Burton this series of four educational films deals with various topics related to marketing. Each program interviews academic experts on theory and then takes the example of one company’s approach to the topic in hand.
